name: CVTime
desc: A structure for reporting Core Video time values.

items.name: init(timeValue: Int64, timeScale: Int32, flags: Int32)
var flags: Int32
items.desc: The flags associated with the CVTime value. See CVTime Values for possible values. If kCVTimeIsIndefinite is set, you should not use any of the other fields in this structure.

items.name: var timeScale: Int32
items.desc: The time scale for this value.
